name: Touch of Death
caster_desc: Your hand glows bright red as you reach out to touch your victim!
victim_desc:
A burning hand reaches out from the darkness and touches you! Searing
flames rip through your flesh!
room_desc: A glowing hand looms in the darkness, and strikes a target.

name: Minor Hellfire
caster_desc: You unleash unholy fire!
victim_desc: You are hit by a wave of unholy fire !!

name: Magic Missile
caster_desc: You send a blazing bolt of pain shooting after your prey!
victim_desc: You are struck by a magical arrow! Egad!
failure_desc: Your incantations have failed. Ooh Gawd!
room_desc: A glowing arrow strikes someone in the room!

name: Fireball
victim_desc: You are burned horribly beyond recognition by a fireball !!
failure_desc:
As you summon the giant ball of fire you are distracted and trip over
an invisible turtle!

name: Flame Spray
caster_desc:
A fountain of fire erupts from your hands, and covers the occupants of
the room with brimstone!
victim_desc:
The room is filled with an explosion of fire! Burning pain runs through
your flesh!

name: Tidal Wave
caster_desc: You hurl a tsunami of death towards you foes!
victim_desc: A giant wave of magical water slams into you!!

name: Unholy Blast
caster_desc: You fill the room with burning agony!!
victim_desc: You are thrown back by an unholy blast!

name: Dragon fire
caster_desc: You summon a Dragon to spill forth its fiery breath!
victim_desc: A mystical dragon's fiery breath sears your skin!
failure_desc: Your attempt to summon a magical dragon fails!

name: Freezing sphere
caster_desc: A Ball of frost comes forth from your finger tips to stop the enemy!
victim_desc:
A ball of frost explodes in the room!
You seem unable to move for the time being!
failure_desc: You fail to freeze you enemies!

name: Sleep
caster_desc: A misty green fog fills the room!
victim_desc: You suddenly feel too sleepy to move!
failure_desc: Your attempt to soothe your opponant has failed!

name: Gripping Plants
caster_desc: You summon the local vegetation to do your bidding!
victim_desc: Nearby plants spring to life and restrain you!

name: Remove Poison
caster_desc: You eat some herbs, and mumble a folk-remedy.
victim_desc: You feel better.

name: earthquake
caster_desc: The earth starts shaking damaging your opponents!
victim_desc:
Debris flies out from the earth and pummles you!
The earth opens up beneath you feet!

name: chestnut hail
caster_desc:
With a flick of your thumb and a twinkle of your eye, you send some angry
chestnuts at your foe!
victim_desc: Out of the sky you are struck by several dozen razor edged chestnuts!
failure_desc: You fail to summon your chestnut friends to your rescue!

name: grave rot 2
caster_desc:
You reach out and call upon the dead to disease your foe.
He screams in agony as his flesh rots and falls off.
victim_desc:
You feel a cold hand on your skin, the cold turns to burning pain
as you feel chunks of your skin peel away and rot!
failure_desc: As you reach out for your victim, his life force repels you.

name: Brain Hammer
caster_desc: You concentrate on #'s mind and begin to crush his psychie.
victim_desc: # reaches forth and plunges his hand into your skull!
failure_desc: You fail to crush #'s mind.  You put the world to sleep.

name: ray of death
caster_desc:
A charged ray comes forth rom your fingertips draining the very essence
of life away from your opponents.
victim_desc: Pain throbs througout your body as a ray of death strikes you.
failure_desc:
You fail to call upon the dead to cast this spell.
Your ancient yearning for the grave calls you back.

name: heal
victim_desc: You are touched by the fairies!  You feel more alive!
failure_desc: You fail to sprinkly your fairy dust.

name: charm
caster_desc: You reach out with you mind and coax people out.
victim_desc: You feel the need to reveal yourself.
failure_desc: You fail to coax anyone out of the shadows

name: killing winds
caster_desc: You flex a muscle inside your body and you release deadly fumes.
victim_desc: # belches forth noxious fumes!  You choke and gag!
failure_desc: You make the mistake and re-inhale your gasses.

name: whisper
caster_desc: You concentrate with your mind and reach out to #.
victim_desc: # reaches out with his mind to contact you.
failure_desc: You concentrate with your mind and speak.

name: lightning bolts
caster_desc: You reach out and throw a lightning bolt at #.
victim_desc: You scream in paint as # throws lighting bolts at you.
failure_desc: Your lightning bolts go out of control and you paralize everyone.

name: death word
failure_desc: You concentrate and fail to invoke the spell

name: Blinding Sun
caster_desc:
The Staff of Ra Radiates a seemingly endless array of light.
It blinds all who see it.
victim_desc:
A blinding Flash of light Burns your eyes!
Your eyes sting, with horrid pain!

name: Animate Shrubbery
caster_desc: You command some nearby bushes to assault yuor foe!
victim_desc:
Some nearby bushes up-root themselves, and are upon you with unholy 
green frenzy!
failure_desc: Your incantations have failed! Ooh Gawd!
room_desc: Some bushes are attacking people!

name: Root Enemy
caster_desc:
A hooded elf...
A good elf...
A sly elf...
A quick elf...
A DEADLY ELF!!!
victim_desc:
He is cool...
He is awesome...
failure_desc: You are thrown back by an unholy blast!
room_desc: Pain and misery are upon you!  The end is nigh!  ARGH!!!

name: Stinging Hornets
caster_desc: You summon a swarm of hornets, and send them off to wreak great havoc!
victim_desc:
A swarm of hornets descends upon you! This must be the result of a 
magical attack!
failure_desc: Your incantations have failed! Ooh Gawd!
room_desc:
A swarm of honets flies into the room, attacking an unsuspecting 
victim.

name: Bog
caster_desc:
A lone tree is immense proportions towers towards the sky here. Its
gigantic roots ripple beneath the ground like some predator fish
caught at the surface of a frozen lake. Its base is as wide around
as a tower, and its rough bark nearly as tough as stone.

Bits of leaves drift down from above like a faint snowfall, and even
though no other trees can grow so close to this monster, the forest
here is dark and forboding.
victim_desc:
Dry wind chars human storm lies barren
Wasted greed taints water thirst dream
The asphalt burial daylight meltdown long
gone. Death grabs at stillborn child another
Low test pesticide not until they are dead
Believe in words attaching dread no meaning
Color world a different level no chance
To rectify...
failure_desc: You Summon a magical dragon to spill forth its fiery breath!

name: North Wind
caster_desc:
Im short, but very long
my axe does my talking
victim_desc:
Ack!

Wombats!      [4;1y
failure_desc: A mystical dragon's fiery breath sears your skin!

name: South Wind
caster_desc:
Hmmm...

Crazy eh?

Well...Just yer friendly neighborhood ArchMagus freak!
:P :P :P :P :P
victim_desc:
As you stare at this incredible killing machine you find yourself in
complete awe. This mummy is unlike any you have ever encountered. You
stare in amazement at his Fluffy WHite Cloud mummy wrappings and realize
that this armour is nearly invincible..and it has more sheets too! Then
you notice his claws...Claws that were made in Japan by the legendary
Ginsu Knife company. My GOD THOSE CLAWS COULD CUT THROUGH A TIN CAN AND
NOT EVEN DULL! You think it best not to fight this machine...ELSE....

YOU ARE DEAD
failure_desc: You summon a Dragon to spill forth its fiery breath!
room_desc: A mystical dragon's fiery breath sears your skin!

name: East Wind
caster_desc:
Just a small litle pesky little fellow
with an annoying smirk on his face
and you don't know why..........
failure_desc: Your attempt to summon a magical dragon fails!
room_desc: SSSS    OOO

name: West Wind
victim_desc:
You see a huge hunk of manly flesh standing before you...
scratching his genitals furiously!
failure_desc: Someone in this room just got *SNUFFED*!!!

name: Tree Attack
caster_desc:
This area contains a few empty rooms surrounding a small
foyer containing an old oak table.
victim_desc:
You find yourself in a semi-circular room with a single large
window facing south. This room is midway up a tower overlooking the
courtyard, but how you can reach the top of the tower eludes you.
The floor is marked with rays of red reaching out from the
north door to the edges of the semi-circle.
failure_desc: The smell of fire and smoke eminates from the east.
room_desc:
The trees in this area uproot themselves and fall upon a hapless 
victim!

name: Prison of Thorns
victim_desc:
As you peer into the opal you see some people walking through a square in
the city of Tai-Tastigon.
failure_desc: The mountain gets steeper towards the north.
room_desc:
bread mold ten stories high with protruding limbs everywhere
name's blorp

name: Morning Frost
caster_desc: You summon a chilling frost with which to hurt your foes!
victim_desc: A frost of terrible cold coats you with ice and agony!
failure_desc: Your incantations have failed! Ooh Gawd!

name: Earth Hammer
caster_desc: You behold a Godlike Individual, with a big bulge in his crotch.
victim_desc: You are burned horribly beyond recognition by a fireball !!
failure_desc: Along the crumbling ledge to the east is a steep hillside wich has a path
room_desc: Someone just got pounded--hard...

name: Flesh to Wood
caster_desc:
The Heart of the Lake is obviously too large and heavy for you to
take or move.
victim_desc:
The bone is that of some unknown creature, but written on it in
black runes is the word: "suedomsa"
failure_desc: Nasty falling rocks are to the west.
room_desc: A ledge along the mountainside is east.

name: Insect Cloud
caster_desc:
The room you stand in is lit by some unknown source. A large circle of black
stone faces upright in the middle of the room, a ring of elder glyphs cut
into the stone around an avellan cross. Thongs possibly designed to tie
wrists and ankles are situated at likely spots on the disk of black marble.
Opposite the stone altar is a black circular mirror, reflecting what little
light there is in this room.

Misty tendrils stream down from the circle of black glass high above like
spiderwebs, seeming to undulate into and out of the black mirror. Something
seems to move inside the writhing mass of darkness.
victim_desc:
The staff is of wood and about 7 feet long. The top of it, however,
is capped with a strange green stone, which has a tendency to give
off an intense jade light.
failure_desc: From a distance, to the west, a dark entrance to a cave can be seen.
room_desc: A crumbling ledge is east.

name: Locust Plague
caster_desc: ex
victim_desc:
ugly Son a ma bitch



makemethief
failure_desc: Darkness is west.
room_desc: A horde of locusts enters the room, vengefully attacking someone!

name: Bear Claws
caster_desc: Nothing much to look at... :)
victim_desc:
I am cool.
Heh heh, heh heh heh heh, heh.
failure_desc: As you pick up the lantern, it starts to glow.
room_desc:
The image of a great bear appears in the air in this room, striking
at people..!

name: Pack of Wolves
caster_desc:
The dagger has a short, curved blade which has a serrated edge.
The blade is coated in a dark liquid you surmise is a deadly poison.
victim_desc:
The dagger has a dark, curved blade made of some unknown metal. Black
runes run along its surface.
failure_desc: The Lantern is finely crafted from the fines brass found in the realm

name: Forest Fire
caster_desc:
This squat stone building off the Emporium market is always dark and
smoky. Cloaked or robed figures can be seen lurking around the
various wares, conducting their business with the wizened Arkinor
with just glances, nods, and subtle hand gestures. Strange smells
greet you, and you feel ill at ease thinking about what some of
the items for sale here might be used for.
victim_desc:
This scroll is on supple parchment, trimmed with gold-leaf. It is marked
with common symbols with appeal to the Gods of good health.
failure_desc: There is a loose stalagmite sticking from the floor here.

name: Tornado
caster_desc:
human knight
good
awesome
victim_desc:
Help me!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Help me (kill you)
failure_desc: As you pick up the staff, you are jolted with a surge of energy.
room_desc: A swirling tornado flies into the room, destroying one occupant!

name: Soul Harvester
caster_desc:
You are in a long gallery which is only dimly illuminated. The walls
here have been carved so that their surface is covered with delicate
flowers. A long purple carpet leads away to the north, its length
embroidered with gold thread into intricate patterns of golden
blossoms.
victim_desc:
This circular room is dominated by a long table of black oak. High
backed chairs flank the table, and an iron lamp hangs down from
above. Overall, the appearance of this room is more stately than
mysterious, placing this area in sharp contrast with the rest of
the tower.
failure_desc: You pick up them mean shades.
room_desc: Crackling black energy rips through the room!

name: Terminal Frost
caster_desc:
This cavern is dark and very cold. Strange and frightening runes
cover the rough walls, but the cave is bare and dark. There are no
visible exits, but a dark pit lies in the center of the room.
victim_desc:
You notice that magical runes have been carved into the floor of
the riverbed! They read in the dark tongue of the Drow:
"Kabbalada"
failure_desc: An eboy staff lies on the ground.

name: Poison Thorn
caster_desc: A gleaming poisonous thorn appears in your hand.
victim_desc: A dark thorn pierces your heart!
failure_desc: Your incantation has failed!
room_desc: You hear a cry of agony!

name: Hands of Fire
caster_desc:
Your hand glows with a burning fire as you reach out to touch
your victim!
victim_desc: A burning vice clutches your heart! Flames rip through your flesh!
failure_desc: Your incantations have failed!
room_desc: A glowing hand of fire hangs before you, burnig your eyes!

name: Silver Dagger
caster_desc: You may select a different class from here if you wish.
victim_desc:
I am a mysterious Half-Elf. You had better watch out, or I'll
use magic on you!
failure_desc: A crocodile munches on your foot before you can escape!!
room_desc: You see a bright knife covered in blood and the agony of its victim!

name: Dark Arrows
caster_desc: You send a flurry of blazing arrows of pain after your prey!
victim_desc: You are struck by a magical arrow!
failure_desc: Your incantation has failed! Argh!
room_desc: A glowing arrow strikes someone in the room.

name: Solar Flare
caster_desc: A croc gnaws at your legs before you can get away!!
victim_desc: A giant wave of magical water slams into you!!
failure_desc: Out of the sky you are struck by several dozen razor edged chestnuts!

name: Spectral Hounds
caster_desc:
This small chamber is walled in glowing jade! A small torch burns
perpetually, bathing the chamber in a warm green glow. This is the secre
vault of the gnome Frognar, a very industrious collector of rare items.
victim_desc: You fail to summon your chestnut friends to your rescue!
failure_desc: # reaches forth and plunges his hand into your skull!

name: Storm
caster_desc:
The room you stand in is lit by some unknown source. A large circle of black
stone faces upright in the middle of the room, a ring of elder glyphs cut
into the stone around an avellan cross. Thongs possibly designed to tie
wrists and ankles are situated at likely spots on the disk of black marble.
Opposite the stone altar is a black circular mirror, reflecting what little
light there is in this room.

Misty tendrils stream down from the circle of black glass high above like
spiderwebs, seeming to undulate into and out of the black mirror. Something
seems to move inside the writhing mass of darkness.
victim_desc: You concentrate on #'s mind and begin to crush his psychie.
failure_desc: You fail to crush #'s mind.  You put the world to sleep.

name: Willow Blast
caster_desc: You summon forth a billowing cloud of fauna to punish your enemies!
victim_desc: A blast of hurricane winds and flying plants stuns you!
failure_desc: Your incantations have failed! Argh!

name: Phantom Sword
caster_desc:
Holding the Phial of Sunset aloft, a soft glow begins to fill the area.
Slowly, a door through east through the debris can be seen, outlined
in a reddish light. You pass through it...
victim_desc: Your attempt to soothe your opponant has failed!
failure_desc: # reaches out with his mind to contact you.
room_desc: You concentrate with your mind and reach out to #.

name: Ring of Fire
caster_desc: You manage to lift up the grate and descend into the darkness below...
victim_desc:
The wand is constructed of a golden metal, and is about a foot and a
half long. It's surface is warm to the touch.
failure_desc: # lifts up a grate and descends beneath the city!

name: Iron collar
caster_desc:
You notice some magical runes which read: "Oh blessed Zababar, in your
name may seals be broken!"
victim_desc:
The  Voulge is a long shafted weapon with a large sharp blade on the end.
The weight of this object makes it impossible to use with one hand.
The blade is long and sharp, so even the slightess miss might do damage.
failure_desc: A ray of sunlight beams down from the city above.
room_desc: # emerges from a grate set into the street stones.

name: Green Dart
caster_desc: You send forth a dart of green energy after your target!
victim_desc: A dart of green energy strikes you!  OUCH!
failure_desc: Your incantations have failed! Argh!
room_desc: Someone in this room has been zapped!

name: Finger of Death
caster_desc: # shimmies up a sewer ladder and escapes into the city above.
victim_desc:
This military fork resembles a spear, with two more points coming
out from the center one.  It is very light weight, and could
possibly even be thrown!
failure_desc: # lifts the grate and plops down into the water below.
room_desc: A shadow obscures the sun..

name: Grave Rot
room_desc: Foul magic is at work!

name: Doomspeak
caster_desc:
How dare you look upon my greatness!
Now you must die!
victim_desc: It is too dark in here.  You can't see a thing!
failure_desc: The juice is loose!!!
room_desc: Moxy the great

name: Blight
victim_desc: There is a hint of light coming from the east.
failure_desc: Your incantations have failed! Argh!

name: Shatter Person
caster_desc:
An image of your foe forms in the air before you, shattering into a
thousand pieces as you speak the words of destruction!
victim_desc:
You feel your bones and internal organs shatter as magic most foul
rips you apart! Aiiighhh!
room_desc: Terrible magic is at work here.

name: Group Destruction
caster_desc:
Your eyes roll back into your head as the words of wrathful vengeance
roll off your tongue...
victim_desc:
Fire and brimstone rain down upon you in a cataclysmic display of
truly biblical proportions!

name: Cold Ball
caster_desc: The gates of Tai-Tastigon are closed!
victim_desc: The gates of Tai-Tastigon are closed!
room_desc: A frosty ball of death flies through the room.

name: Acid Ball
caster_desc: The door is stuck!
victim_desc: A crowded square is north.
failure_desc: You see a dark shadow hovering above the ground.
room_desc: A ball of acid strikes someone in the room, burning him horribly!

name: Invisibility
caster_desc: You unleash unholy fire!
failure_desc: An ornate shop is west.

name: Pinecones of Death
caster_desc: You behold a Godlike Individual, with a big bulge in his crotch.
victim_desc: Someone just got pounded--hard...
failure_desc: You are burned horribly beyond recognition by a fireball !!
room_desc: You see a dark shadow hovering above the ground.

name: Water Flowing
caster_desc:
My name
is Indigo Montoya.
You killed my father.
Prepare to die.
victim_desc:
ugly
purple
yellow
green
black
gone
failure_desc: # can be seen at the base of the structure.
room_desc:
You lift the weapon, shuddering at the very touch of the unnaturally
cold steel...

room_desc:
This shop off the jade market deals in curiosities and rare items. Its
close quarters are crammed with all manner of items which tempt the eye,
though lighten the purse. Items of luxury and opulence can be bought
for the right price, or sold for whatever they might be worth.

name: Quaking Earth
caster_desc:
hey this is Jm Of the MIGHTy MIGHTY Knights
BEWARE: I might be rusty but I know what to  do
Make a mistake and you shall Perish
(flakey, ain't it?)
victim_desc:
The rod is about 3 feet long, made of an almost metallic looking
wood. It is richly carved, and tipped with a iron point.
failure_desc: On the ground here is a large black mace.

name: Wind Blowing
caster_desc: This area is a confusing jumble of dark, smoky, and bare chambers.
failure_desc: Away with you, vile Unbeliever!
room_desc: You are hit by a wave of unholy fire !!

name: Hailstorm
caster_desc: You send forth a dart of green energy after your target!
victim_desc: You see a bright knife covered in blood and the agony of its victim!
failure_desc: Someone in this room has been zapped!
room_desc: A dart of green energy strikes you!  OUCH!

name: Oak Arm
caster_desc: The shop's exit is east.
victim_desc: A very large cavern is west.

name: Searing Heat
caster_desc: The gloves are of thick leather, and are a sooty black.
victim_desc: You have found a hidden passage leading south!
